meanings.definition: Not showing or feeling hostility; friendly.
meanings.sent1: The nonhostile cat approached the child with a gentle purr.
meanings.sent2: The nonhostile gesture of a smile can brighten someone's day.
meanings.sent3: The nonhostile puppy wagged its tail happily at the new visitor.
meanings.sent4: The nonhostile environment of the park made everyone feel at ease.
meanings.sent5: The nonhostile atmosphere at the party made it a joyous occasion.

meanings.definition: Not characterized by or showing hostility.
meanings.sent1: The nonhostile negotiation led to a peaceful resolution.
meanings.sent2: The nonhostile meeting allowed for open communication between the teams.
meanings.sent3: The nonhostile competition brought out the best in all the participants.
meanings.sent4: The nonhostile debate showcased respectful disagreement.
meanings.sent5: The nonhostile relationship between the neighbors created a harmonious community.
